title: SourceCleanupProgress Event
description: Event published by services to report progress during cascade cleanup of a deleted source.

source_name.description: Name of the source being cleaned up

correlation_id.description: Correlation ID from the original SourceDeletionRequested event

service_name.description: Name of the service reporting progress (e.g., 'parsing', 'chunking', 'embedding')

status.description: Current status of cleanup in this service

deletion_counts.description: Counts of deleted items per collection/resource type

error_summary.description: Optional non-sensitive summary of errors encountered

completed_at.description: Timestamp when cleanup completed (for status=completed or failed)
